name: Potatoes with Vegetables
steps: Wash and cut 4-­‐6 medium potatoes into bite size chunks. Add any vegetable that you like, cut into bite size
chunks. (Carrots, peppers, onions, squash, etc.) Put everything in a large bowl, and cover generously with
olive oil. Add 1-­‐2 packets Lipton Onion Soup Mix, Ranch Mix, or Italian Mix. Any dry mix will work. Make
sure everything is evenly and generously coated. Spread on cookie sheet and bake at 425° for 20 minutes or
